name: Merge Shot (CodeBlues)
description:
Bounce the ball against the wall as many as the number of balls coming down.

The wide-area skill, which reduces the number of all balls by one for every five successful attempts, 

It's activated. Remember, only 1 and 2 are excluded.

If a total of three balls touch the bottom and disappear, it's a loss. You can do it again with the coins you have

You can also watch the ad and do it again.

If you fail the merge, you will lose 2 points each.

The balls become the same color as the player when the player becomes the same number

At this point, hit the ball and merge it!

If the level of difficulty increases, there's a square wall in the center of the map

It also has the same properties as a ball, but it bounces the player like a normal wall.

Get a lot of points and try to be in the top ranks!
